jitter2D 0.0.1
  • Reference

Package index

Main functions

geom_jitter_gauss()
Jittered 2D points based on Bivariate normal distribution
geom_jitter_quasi()
Jittered 2D points based on Sobolev sequence
geom_jitter_quasiloc()
Jittered 2D points based on Sobolev local sequence
geom_jitter_quasitog()
Jittered 2D points based on Sobol sequence (toggle local/global)
position_jitter_gauss()
2D Jitter points to avoid overplotting based on Gaussian bivariate distribution
position_jitter_quasi()
2D Jitter points to avoid overplotting based on Sobolev sequence
position_jitter_quasiloc()
2D Jitter points to avoid overplotting based on Sobolev local sequence
position_jitter_quasitog()
2D Jitter points to avoid overplotting based on Sobol sequence (toggle local/global)
dayles
A toy data set for testing methods

Developed by Natalia da Silva, Ignacio Alvarez-Castro, Dianne Cook, Jayani P. Gamage.
